subject: RE: [junit] How Junit will test all assert methods, even if one or more assert methods fails in a TestCase?
msgSnippet: ... Grrrrr... ... As long as I get a hand in arguing the don t case. Perhaps for the last time! Wouldn t that be great? -- J. B. Rainsberger, President,
messageBody:
> Good plan. Then we can get back to discussing important issues, like
> whether we should test ALL accessor methods! :-)

Grrrrr...

> But seriously ... while the FAQ is being updated, can we get the
> accessor method issue addressed the same way in the FAQ? Something
> along the lines of "test or don't test the accessor methods, it's
> your choice!" :-)

As long as I get a hand in arguing the "don't" case. Perhaps for the last
time! Wouldn't that be great?

--
J. B. Rainsberger,
President, Diaspar Software Services
Let's write software that people understand.
http://www.diasparsoftware.com/
